page.title: 13Trading in Bodenham
page.content: Shops - Bache's Bargains The owner is Ron Bache. He is his own manager. He has 3 people working for him. He sells many things including toys, household goods, and greengrocery. There are 4 buildings on his land. He has an area for growing "Pick Your Own" fruit. The Post Office / Shop owned by Mr A Hunt. This is a typical village shop selling a wide variety of goods.People collect pensions and allowances, stamps and postal orders.The children spend their pocket money on sweets here. Mr Hunt also retails milk and dairy products, delivers milk in the area and employs 5 people. Saffrons Cross Garage - Owned by Mr and Mrs Howarth for 17 years has 5 people working there and 3 living on site in a bungalow.The garage has a shop, off licence, petrol station, car spares, new cars and repair workshop.
